testcase.classname: Sample feature to demonstrate the capabilities of this Web application
testcase.name: Verify HomePage Functionality
testcase.system-out: Given User opens backbase qa task website URL and then enter Username and Password.passed When User verify title on task home page....................................passed Given User verify task home page logo.......................................passed Then User verify Home, Signin and signup link in header section.............passed Then User verify popular list of tags section...............................passed Then User verify list of articles pulled from either Feed, Global, or by Tag.passed Then User verify pagination for list of articles............................passed

testcase.classname: Sample feature to demonstrate the capabilities of this Web application
testcase.name: Verify Settings page and Logout functionality
testcase.system-out: Given User opens backbase qa task website URL and then enter Username and Password.passed When User verify title on task home page....................................passed Given User Signin Functionality Email and password..........................passed When User click on settings link............................................passed When Verify Your settings label displayed...................................passed Then Verify URL, username, description, email, password text field..........passed Then User verify update settings and logout button..........................passed Then User logout from application...........................................passed Then verify user successfully logout........................................passed

testcase.classname: Sample feature to demonstrate the capabilities of this Web application
testcase.name: User Verify Editor page to create/read/edit/delete Articles and Post
testcase.system-out: Given User opens backbase qa task website URL and then enter Username and Password.passed When User verify title on task home page....................................passed Given User Signin Functionality Email and password..........................passed Then User create a new Article title Test Web Automation about Automation description Automation is cool tags api.passed When User <ProfileName> read the created article Test Web Automation about Automation.passed Then User <ProfileName> update the article Title Updated....................passed Then User <ProfileName> delete the Article Updated..........................passed When User created a post My New Post on Article.............................passed Then User read the post My New Post.........................................passed Then User Delete the post My New Post.......................................passed Then User logout from application...........................................passed
